homeTopText: A Platform that Supports Your Life Long Career Journey

category.title: Weekly Office Hour
category.description: In just 30 minutes, gain practical tips from experienced mentors on overcoming workplace challenges and becoming a valuable asset to your team and organization. Submit your questions in advance and get answers during the live weekly session.

category.title: Focus Group
category.description: Join a mentor-led discussion group where you’ll learn how to ask the right questions, discover your talents, handle workplace stress and relationships, and become a blessing to your company, boss, and colleagues.

category.title: Beautiful Land Initiative
category.description: Equipping Christians with a heart to serve workplace needs, this program helps you build the skills and confidence to become a blessing to those around you. You'll learn to use the rich resources of the I FLY YOUNG CCE platform. Participants must have completed at least one year (or two seasons) of Focus Group sessions to register.

category.title: CCE Class
category.description: Designed for students in grades 8-12, this program teaches 12 life-changing capabilities—including listening accurately, asking thoughtful questions, and navigating failure—that support both college readiness and long-term career success.

category.title: CCE Webinar
category.description: Join our webinars for new program launches, career path exploration (medical, investment banking, finance-technology, architecture, trading industry....etc.) and more.

category.title: About Us
category.description: Rooted in the spirit of giving and receiving—get to know the team behind the mission.

category.title: CCE Chronicle
category.description: Discover real-world career insights through interviews with industry professionals, thoughtfully conducted by our Chronicle college student team.

category.title: Interview Training (Eagle Wing)
category.description: Build the capability and confidence you need to excel in high-pressure job interviews.

category.title: Internship (Soaring Eagle)
category.description: Gain hands-on experience through projects valued by the industry, guided by mentorship from seasoned professionals.

joinDes1: Enter your email to receive updates on our activities and events!
joinDes2: Regardless of your skills or experience, you can make a lasting impact through the CCE community!
